about.text1: Curious, rigorous and eager to learn... :)
about.text2: What drives me: contributing to high-impact projects where technology can truly make things better... and avoiding creating yet another bug
about.text3: My goal: to evolve as a versatile developer, always improving, always looking for more efficient and useful solutions... with a minimum of caffeine and a lot of pleasure

radiant.title: Radiant Skincare
radiant.desc: Get a custom routine based on your skin type.

usage.oily: Morning: Gentle cleanser, Purifying serum, Light moisturizer. Evening: Double cleanse, Active (AHA/BHA), Moisturizer.
usage.dry: Morning: Floral water or milk, Hydrating serum, Rich cream. Evening: Oil makeup remover, Nourishing cream, Face oil.
usage.combo: Morning: Gel cleanser, Balancing serum, Fluid. Evening: Gentle cleanse, Retinol (optional), Moisturizer.
usage.sensitive: Morning: Thermal water, Soothing serum, Barrier cream. Evening: Cleansing oil, Repair care. Avoid rubbing.
usage.default: Morning: Cleanse, Hydrate, Protect. Evening: Cleanse, Treat, Hydrate.

results.title: Your Personalized Routine

routines.oily: Cleanser (e.g., CeraVe Foaming, La Roche-Posay Effaclar, Bioderma Sebium) + Serum (e.g., The Ordinary Niacinamide, Paula's Choice Pore, Inkey List Niacinamide) + Gel (e.g., Neutrogena Hydro Boost, Clinique Dramatically Different Gel, Versed Dew Point)
routines.dry: Milk/Oil (e.g., La Roche-Posay Toleriane, DHC Oil, Aveeno Calm+Restore) + Serum (e.g., Hyalu B5, Vichy MinÃ©ral 89, The Ordinary HA) + Cream (e.g., CeraVe Cream, First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair, Vanicream)
routines.combo: Gentle Gel (e.g., Bioderma Sensibio, Fresh Soy, Youth to the People) + Serum (e.g., The Ordinary Buffet, Caudalie Vinoperfect, EstÃ©e Lauder ANR) + Fluid (e.g., La Roche-Posay Effaclar Duo, Kiehl's Ultra Facial, Clinique Moisture Surge)
routines.sensitive: Micellar/Milk (e.g., Bioderma Sensibio, Aveeno Calm, Cetaphil Gentle) + Serum (e.g., La Roche-Posay Toleriane, Dr. Jart+ Cicapair, Aveeno Triple Oat) + Balm (e.g., Cicaplast B5, Avene Cicalfate, La Roche-Posay Lipikar)
routines.default: Gentle Cleanser + Light Moisturizer + Sun Protection

hands_feet.title: Hands & Feet Care
hands_feet.oily: Hands: Light Cream (e.g., Neutrogena Hydro Boost, L'Occitane Verbena, Aesop Resurrection). Feet: Scrub (e.g., The Body Shop Peppermint, Lush Pumice) + Gel (e.g., Scholl Fresh, L'Occitane Shea).
hands_feet.dry: Hands: Repair Cream (e.g., CeraVe Hand, O'Keeffe's Working Hands, Neutrogena Norwegian). Feet: Urea (e.g., Eucerin 10% Urea, CeraVe SA Renewing, Gold Bond).
hands_feet.combo: Hands: Daily Moisture (e.g., Nivea Soft, Vaseline, Aveeno Daily). Feet: Nourishing (e.g., Burt's Bees Coconut, Palmer's Cocoa Butter, Sol de Janeiro).
hands_feet.sensitive: Hands: Fragrance-Free (e.g., Aveeno Relief, Eucerin Advanced, CeraVe Therapeutic). Feet: Soothing (e.g., La Roche-Posay Lipikar, Aveeno CICA, Cetaphil).
hands_feet.default: Moisturize your hands after every wash. Care for your feet at night.

advice.oily: Use salicylic acid twice a week.
advice.dry: Avoid hot water and alcohol-based products.
advice.combo: Hydrate cheeks well and treat the T-zone locally.
advice.sensitive: Less is more. Prioritize fragrance-free products.

results.bonus_text: Bonus for "{0}": Add a targeted active in the evening (e.g., Retinol for aging, Vitamin C for radiance).

quote.title: Famous Quote
quote.desc: Choose a theme to discover a timeless thought.

love.text: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
love.author: Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry

love.text: The only true language in the world is a kiss.
love.author: Alfred de Musset

courage.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
courage.author: Nelson Mandela

courage.text: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
courage.author: E.E. Cummings

time.text: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
time.author: Hector Berlioz

success.text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
success.author: Winston Churchill

success.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
success.author: Steve Jobs

wisdom.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
wisdom.author: Socrates

nature.text: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
nature.author: Albert Einstein

happiness.text: Happiness is sometimes hidden in the unknown.
happiness.author: Victor Hugo

happiness.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

peace.text: There was never a good war, or a bad peace.
peace.author: Benjamin Franklin

rhyme.title: Rhyme-Me Green
rhyme.desc: Enter a nature element or theme (e.g., Ocean, Forest, Love) and read.

responses.forest: I am the earth's lungs, my roots embrace the world's history. Listen to the whisper of my leaves, carrying the wisdom of centuries.
responses.ocean: Vast and deep, I keep the secrets of the abyss. My surface reflects the sky, but my heart beats to the rhythm of eternal tides.
responses.sun: I burn endlessly to offer life. My light chases shadows, warming every soul, every stone, every hope.
responses.moon: Queen of the night, I watch over your dreams. In my silver silence, I guide lost travelers and lonely poets.
responses.wind: Invisible and powerful, I am the breath of change. I caress faces and uproot doubts, a traveler with no ties.
responses.mountain: Still and proud, I touch the clouds. My peaks are challenges, my valleys refuges. I am patience turned to stone.
responses.flower: Ephemeral beauty, I open to the world with grace. Every petal is a promise of color, a smile offered to the light.
default:
In the silence of {0},
The wind whispers an ancient secret,
Leaves dance, the spirit calms,
Nature reclaims its rights, serene.

The echo of {0} resounds afar,
Like a morning caress,
Everything awakens, everything is light,
In this world, a prayer.

Under the sky, {0} stands tall,
Witness of time, without weakness,
Deep roots, vibrant heart,
Hymn to life, eternally.
